appTitle: LottoMate â€“ Simple Lotto Number Generator
guideList: Press the 'Generate Numbers' button to randomly generate 6 lotto numbers.
If the generated numbers exactly match any past winning numbers, new numbers will be generated automatically.
Press the 'Save Numbers' button to save up to 5 games in local storage.
Saved numbers can be viewed in the 'Saved Numbers' section at the bottom of the screen.
Press the 'Save as PNG' button to download the saved numbers list as an image.
